templates.name: greeting
templates.message: Hi {customer_name}! I'm your AI shopping assistant. I'm here to help with any questions about your order #{order_id}. How can I assist you today?

templates.name: apology_delay
templates.message: I sincerely apologize for the delay with your {product_name}. Let me check the latest tracking information and see how I can make this right for you.

templates.name: exchange_confirmation
templates.message: Perfect! I've arranged an exchange for {new_product}. You'll receive a prepaid return label via email, and your new item will ship within 24 hours with tracking number {tracking}. Is there anything else I can help with?

templates.name: refund_confirmation
templates.message: Your refund of ${amount} has been processed and will appear in your account within {processing_days} business days. You'll receive an email confirmation shortly. Thank you for giving us a try!
